◆ addNebulaFromPNG() [2/2]

static SectorEntityToken com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.addNebulaFromPNG ( String  image,
float  centerX,

Definition at line 1696 of file Misc.java.

1698 {
1699 try {
1700 BufferedImage img = null;
1701 //img = ImageIO.read(new File("../starfarer.res/res/data/campaign/terrain/nebula_test.png"));
1702 img = ImageIO.read(Global.getSettings().openStream(image));
1703
1704 int chunkSize = 10000;
1705 int w = img.getWidth();
1706 int h = img.getHeight();
1707 Raster data = img.getData();
1708 for (int i = 0; i < w; i += chunkSize) {
1709 for (int j = 0; j < h; j += chunkSize) {
1710
1711 int chunkWidth = chunkSize;
1712 if (i + chunkSize > w) chunkWidth = w - i;
1713 int chunkHeight = chunkSize;
1714 if (j + chunkSize > h) chunkHeight = h - i;
1715
1716// boolean hasAny = false;
1717// for (int x = i; x < i + chunkWidth; x++) {
1718// for (int y = j; y < j + chunkHeight; y++) {
1719// int [] pixel = data.getPixel(i, h - j - 1, (int []) null);
1720// int total = pixel[0] + pixel[1] + pixel[2];
1721// if (total > 0) {
1722// hasAny = true;
1723// break;
1724// }
1725// }
1726// }
1727// if (!hasAny) continue;
1728
1729 StringBuilder string = new StringBuilder();
1730 for (int y = j + chunkHeight - 1; y >= j; y--) {
1731 for (int x = i; x < i + chunkWidth; x++) {
1732 int [] pixel = data.getPixel(x, h - y - 1, (int []) null);
1733 int total = pixel[0] + pixel[1] + pixel[2];
1734 if (total > 0) {
1735 string.append("x");
1736 } else {
1737 string.append(" ");
1738 }
1739 }
1740 }
1741
1742 float tileSize = NebulaTerrainPlugin.TILE_SIZE;
1743 float x = centerX - tileSize * (float) w / 2f + (float) i * tileSize + chunkWidth / 2f * tileSize;
1744 float y = centerY - tileSize * (float) h / 2f + (float) j * tileSize + chunkHeight / 2f * tileSize;
1745
1746 SectorEntityToken curr = location.addTerrain(terrainType, new TileParams(string.toString(),
1747 chunkWidth, chunkHeight,
1748 category, key, tilesWide, tilesHigh, null));
1749 curr.getLocation().set(x, y);
1750
1751 if (location instanceof StarSystemAPI) {
1752 StarSystemAPI system = (StarSystemAPI) location;
1753
1754 system.setAge(age);
1755 system.setHasSystemwideNebula(true);
1756 }
1757
1758 return curr;
1759 }
1760 }
1761 return null;
1762 } catch (IOException e) {
1763 throw new RuntimeException(e);
1764 }
1765 }

)

Returns true if it added anything to the tooltip.

Definition at line 4071 of file Misc.java.

4073 {
4074 SubmarketPlugin storage = Misc.getStorage(market);
4075 SubmarketPlugin local = Misc.getLocalResources(market);
4076
4077 CargoAPI cargo = Global.getFactory().createCargo(true);
4078 List<FleetMemberAPI> ships = new ArrayList<FleetMemberAPI>();
4079 if (storage != null) {
4080 cargo.addAll(storage.getCargo());
4081 ships.addAll(storage.getCargo().getMothballedShips().getMembersListCopy());
4082 }
4083 if (local != null && includeLocalResources) {
4084 cargo.addAll(local.getCargo());
4085 ships.addAll(local.getCargo().getMothballedShips().getMembersListCopy());
4086 }
4087
4088 float opad = 15f;
4089 if (!cargo.isEmpty() || addSectionIfEmpty) {
4090 String title = "Cargo in storage";
4091 if (includeLocalResources && local != null) {
4092 title = "Cargo in storage and resource stockpiles";
4093 }
4094 tooltip.addSectionHeading(title, color, dark, Alignment.MID, opad);
4095 opad = 10f;
4096 tooltip.showCargo(cargo, 10, true, opad);
4097 }
4098
4099 if (!ships.isEmpty() || addSectionIfEmpty) {
4100 String title = "Ships in storage";
4101 if (includeLocalResources && local != null) {
4102 title = "Ships in storage";
4103 }
4104 tooltip.addSectionHeading(title, color, dark, Alignment.MID, opad);
4105 opad = 10f;
4106 tooltip.showShips(ships, 10, true, opad);
4107 }
4108
4109 if (!market.isPlayerOwned()) {
4110 int cost = getStorageCostPerMonth(market);
4111 if (cost > 0) {
4112 tooltip.addPara("Monthly storage fee: %s", opad, getHighlightColor(), getDGSCredits(cost));
4113 }
4114 }
4115
4116 if (addSectionIfEmpty) return true;
4117
4118 return !cargo.isEmpty() || !ships.isEmpty();
4119 }

4856 {

4858 beacon.addTag(beaconTag);
4859
4860 float radius = (gap.start + gap.end) / 2f;
4861 float orbitDays = radius / (10f + StarSystemGenerator.random.nextFloat() * 5f);
4862 beacon.setCircularOrbitPointingDown(center, StarSystemGenerator.random.nextFloat() * 360f, radius, orbitDays);
4863

4865 Color pingColor = new Color(255,200,0,255);
4866 if (beaconTag.equals(Tags.BEACON_MEDIUM)) {

4868 pingColor = new Color(250,155,0,255);

4870 glowColor = new Color(250,55,0,255);
4871 pingColor = new Color(250,125,0,255);
4872 }
4873 Misc.setWarningBeaconColors(beacon, glowColor, pingColor);
4874 return beacon;

3626 null, text, true),
3627 factionId);
3628

3630 impact.delta = repChangePerson;
3631 impact.limit = personLimit;
3632 Global.getSector().adjustPlayerReputation(
3633 new RepActionEnvelope(RepActions.CUSTOM, impact,
3634 null, text, true), person);
3635 }
3636 }

◆ applyDamage() [2/2]

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.applyDamage ( FleetMemberAPI  member,
Random  random,

)

Definition at line 5387 of file Misc.java.

5390 {
5391 if (random == null) random = Misc.random;
5392 damageMult *= 0.75f + random.nextFloat() * 0.5f;
5393
5394// float hitStrength = 0f;
5395// hitStrength += member.getHullSpec().getArmorRating() * 0.1f;
5396// hitStrength *= damageMult;
5397
5398 // hull damage going to be overridden by hullDamageFraction, anyway
5399 // so just want enough hitStrength to visibly damage the armor
5400 float hitStrength = member.getHullSpec().getArmorRating() * 2f;
5401
5402 float hullDamageFraction = 0.025f * damageMult;
5403 float max = 0.5f + random.nextFloat() * 0.1f;
5404 float min = 0.01f + random.nextFloat() * 0.04f;
5405 if (hullDamageFraction > max) hullDamageFraction = max;
5406 if (hullDamageFraction < min) hullDamageFraction = min;
5407
5408 if (hitStrength > 0) {
5409 float numHits = 3f;
5410 for (int i = 0; i < numHits; i++) {
5411 member.getStatus().applyDamage(hitStrength / numHits, hullDamageFraction / numHits);
5412 }
5413 if (member.getStatus().getHullFraction() < 0.01f) {
5414 member.getStatus().setHullFraction(0.01f);
5415 }
5416
5417 boolean isPF = member != null && member.getFleetData() != null &&
5418 member.getFleetData().getFleet() != null && member.getFleetData().getFleet().isPlayerFleet();
5419
5420 if (withCRDamage) {
5421 float crPerDep = member.getDeployCost();
5422 float currCR = member.getRepairTracker().getBaseCR();
5423 float crDamage = Math.min(currCR, crPerDep * 0.1f * damageMult);
5424 if (crDamage > 0) {
5425 if (isPF) {
5426 member.getRepairTracker().applyCREvent(-crDamage, crDamageId, crDamageReason);
5427 } else {
5428 member.getRepairTracker().applyCREvent(-crDamage, null, null);
5429 }
5430 }
5431 }
5432
5433 if (withMessage && isPF) {
5434 MessageIntel intel = new MessageIntel(messageText,
5435 Misc.getNegativeHighlightColor());
5436 intel.setIcon(Global.getSettings().getSpriteName("intel", "damage_report"));
5437
5438 if (textPanel != null) {
5439 Global.getSector().getIntelManager().addIntelToTextPanel(intel, textPanel);
5440 } else {
5441 Global.getSector().getCampaignUI().addMessage(intel, MessageClickAction.REFIT_TAB, member);
5442 }
5443 }
5444 }
5445 }

◆ approach()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.approach ( float  curr,
float  dest,
float  minSpeed,
float  diffSpeedMult,
float  amount 
)
static

Definition at line 2542 of file Misc.java.

2542 {
2543 float diff = dest - curr;
2544 float delta = (Math.signum(diff) * minSpeed + (diff * diffSpeedMult)) * amount;
2545
2546 if (Math.abs(delta) > Math.abs(diff)) delta = diff;
2547 return curr + delta;
2548 }

◆ areSegmentsCoincident()

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.areSegmentsCoincident ( Vector2f  a1,
Vector2f  a2,
Vector2f  b1,
Vector2f  b2 
)
static

Definition at line 2005 of file Misc.java.

2005 {
2006 float denom = (b2.y - b1.y) * (a2.x - a1.x) - (b2.x - b1.x) * (a2.y - a1.y);
2007 float numUa = (b2.x - b1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (b2.y - b1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x);
2008 float numUb = (a2.x - a1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (a2.y - a1.y) *(a1.x - b1.x);
2009
2010 if (denom == 0 && !(numUa == 0 && numUb == 0)) { // parallel, not coincident
2011 return false;
2012 }
2013
2014 if (denom == 0 && numUa == 0 && numUb == 0) { // coincident
2015 return true;
2016 }
2017
2018 return false;
2019 }

◆ bezier()

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.bezier ( Vector2f  p0,
Vector2f  p1,
Vector2f  p2,
float  t 
)
static

Definition at line 6045 of file Misc.java.

6045 {
6046 if (t < 0) t = 0;
6047 if (t > 1) t = 1;
6048 Vector2f r = new Vector2f();
6049 r.x = (1f - t) * (1f - t) * p0.x + 2f * (1f - t) * t * p1.x + t * t * p2.x;
6050 r.y = (1f - t) * (1f - t) * p0.y + 2f * (1f - t) * t * p1.y + t * t * p2.y;
6051 return r;
6052 }

6060 3f * (1f - t) * (1f - t) * t * p1.x +

◆ cleanBuffer()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.cleanBuffer ( Buffer  toBeDestroyed)
static

Definition at line 2550 of file Misc.java.

2550 {
2551 try {
2552 if (toBeDestroyed instanceof DirectBuffer) {
2553 Cleaner cleaner = ((DirectBuffer) toBeDestroyed).cleaner();
2554 if (cleaner != null) cleaner.clean();
2555 Global.getLogger(Misc.class).info(String.format("Cleaned buffer (using cast)"));
2556 return;
2557 } else {
2558
2559 }
2560
2561 Method cleanerMethod = toBeDestroyed.getClass().getMethod("cleaner");
2562 cleanerMethod.setAccessible(true);
2563 Object cleaner = cleanerMethod.invoke(toBeDestroyed);
2564 if (cleaner != null) {
2565 Method cleanMethod = cleaner.getClass().getMethod("clean");
2566 cleanMethod.setAccessible(true);
2567 cleanMethod.invoke(cleaner);
2568 Global.getLogger(Misc.class).info(String.format("Cleaned buffer (using reflection)"));
2569 } else {
2570 Global.getLogger(Misc.class).warn(String.format("Buffer can not be cleaned"));
2571 }
2572 } catch (Exception e) {
2573 Global.getLogger(Misc.class).warn(e.getMessage(), e);
2574 }
2575 }

◆ clearAreaAroundPlayer()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.clearAreaAroundPlayer ( float  minDist)
static

Definition at line 3841 of file Misc.java.

3841 {
3842 CampaignFleetAPI player = Global.getSector().getPlayerFleet();
3843 if (player == null) return;
3844
3845 for (CampaignFleetAPI other : player.getContainingLocation().getFleets()) {
3846 if (player == other) continue;
3847 if (other.getBattle() != null) continue;
3848 if (other.getOrbit() != null) continue;
3849 if (!other.isHostileTo(player)) continue;
3850
3851 float dist = Misc.getDistance(player.getLocation(), other.getLocation());
3852 if (dist < minDist) {
3853 float angle = Misc.getAngleInDegrees(player.getLocation(), other.getLocation());
3854 Vector2f v = Misc.getUnitVectorAtDegreeAngle(angle);
3855 v.scale(minDist);
3856 Vector2f.add(v, other.getLocation(), v);
3857 other.setLocation(v.x, v.y);
3858 }
3859 }
3860 }

◆ closestPointOnLineToPoint()

Vector2f  p2,
Vector2f  p3 
)
static

Definition at line 1803 of file Misc.java.

1803 {
1804 float u = (p3.x - p1.x) * (p2.x - p1.x) + (p3.y - p1.y) * (p2.y - p1.y);
1805 float denom = Vector2f.sub(p2, p1, new Vector2f()).length();
1806 denom *= denom;
1807 //if (denom == 0) return 0;
1808 u /= denom;
1809 Vector2f i = new Vector2f();
1810 i.x = p1.x + u * (p2.x - p1.x);
1811 i.y = p1.y + u * (p2.y - p1.y);
1812 return i;
1813 }

◆ closestPointOnSegmentToPoint()

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.closestPointOnSegmentToPoint ( Vector2f  p1,
Vector2f  p2,
Vector2f  p3 
)
static

Definition at line 1815 of file Misc.java.

1815 {
1816 float u = (p3.x - p1.x) * (p2.x - p1.x) + (p3.y - p1.y) * (p2.y - p1.y);
1817 float denom = Vector2f.sub(p2, p1, new Vector2f()).length();
1818 denom *= denom;
1819
1820 u /= denom;
1821
1822 // if closest point on line is outside the segment, clamp to on the segment
1823 if (u < 0) u = 0;
1824 if (u > 1) u = 1;
1825
1826 Vector2f i = new Vector2f();
1827 i.x = p1.x + u * (p2.x - p1.x);
1828 i.y = p1.y + u * (p2.y - p1.y);
1829 return i;
1830 }

◆ computeCoreWorldsExtent()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.computeCoreWorldsExtent ( )
static

Definition at line 6125 of file Misc.java.

6125 {
6126 Vector2f min = new Vector2f();
6127 Vector2f max = new Vector2f();
6128 for (StarSystemAPI curr : Global.getSector().getStarSystems()) {
6129 if (curr.hasTag(Tags.THEME_CORE)) {
6130 Vector2f loc = curr.getLocation();
6131 min.x = Math.min(min.x, loc.x);
6132 min.y = Math.min(min.y, loc.y);
6133 max.x = Math.max(max.x, loc.x);
6134 max.y = Math.max(max.y, loc.y);
6135 }
6136 }
6137
6138 Vector2f core = Vector2f.add(min, max, new Vector2f());
6139 core.scale(0.5f);
6140
6141 Global.getSector().getMemoryWithoutUpdate().set("$coreWorldsMin", min);
6142 Global.getSector().getMemoryWithoutUpdate().set("$coreWorldsMax", max);
6143 Global.getSector().getMemoryWithoutUpdate().set("$coreWorldsCenter", core);
6144 }

◆ computeEconUnitChangeFromTradeModChange()

static int com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.computeEconUnitChangeFromTradeModChange ( CommodityOnMarketAPI  com,
int  quantity 
)
static

Definition at line 5513 of file Misc.java.

5513 {
5514 float currQty = com.getCombinedTradeModQuantity();
5515 int currMod = (int) com.getModValueForQuantity(currQty);
5516
5517 float quantityWithTX = com.getTradeMod().getModifiedValue() + quantity +
5518 Math.max(com.getTradeModPlus().getModifiedValue(), 0) +
5519 Math.min(com.getTradeModMinus().getModifiedValue(), 0);
5520
5521 int newMod = (int) com.getModValueForQuantity(quantityWithTX);
5522
5523 int diff = newMod - currMod;
5524
5525 return diff;
5526 }

◆ computeShutdownRefund()

static int com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.computeShutdownRefund ( MarketAPI  market,
Industry  industry 
)
static

Definition at line 4822 of file Misc.java.

4822 {
4823 float refund = 0;
4824
4825 Industry upInd = null;
4826 if (industry.isUpgrading()) {
4827 String up = industry.getSpec().getUpgrade();
4828 if (up != null) {
4829 upInd = market.instantiateIndustry(up);
4830 }
4831 }
4832 if (industry.isUpgrading() && upInd != null) {
4833 refund += upInd.getBuildCost();
4834 }
4835
4836 float refundFraction = Global.getSettings().getFloat("industryRefundFraction");
4837 Industry curr = industry;
4838 while (curr != null) {
4839 if (curr.isBuilding() && !curr.isUpgrading()) {
4840 refund += curr.getBuildCost();
4841 } else {
4842 refund += curr.getBuildCost() * refundFraction;
4843 }
4844 String down = curr.getSpec().getDowngrade();
4845 if (down != null) {
4846 curr = market.instantiateIndustry(down);
4847 } else {
4848 curr = null;
4849 }
4850 }
4851
4852 return (int) refund;
4853 }

6104 {
6105 for (CampaignTerrainAPI ter : location.getTerrainCopy()) {
6106 if (ter.getPlugin() instanceof SlipstreamTerrainPlugin2) {
6107 SlipstreamTerrainPlugin2 plugin = (SlipstreamTerrainPlugin2) ter.getPlugin();
6108 List<SlipstreamSegment> segments = plugin.getSegments();
6109 int skip = Math.max(20, segments.size() / 10);
6110 for (int i = 0; i < segments.size(); i += skip) {
6111 int i2 = i + skip;
6112 if (i2 > segments.size() - skip/2) i2 = segments.size() - 1;
6113 if (i2 >= segments.size()) i2 = segments.size() - 1;
6114
6115 if (i2 <= i) break;
6116
6117 Vector2f p = intersectSegments(segments.get(i).loc, segments.get(i2).loc, from, to);
6118 if (p != null) return true;
6119 }
6120 }
6121 }
6122 return false;
6123 }

)

Shortest distance from line to a point.

Parameters
p1line1
p2line2
p3point

Definition at line 1791 of file Misc.java.

1791 {
1792 float u = (p3.x - p1.x) * (p2.x - p1.x) + (p3.y - p1.y) * (p2.y - p1.y);
1793 float denom = Vector2f.sub(p2, p1, new Vector2f()).length();
1794 denom *= denom;
1795 //if (denom == 0) return 0;
1796 u /= denom;
1797 Vector2f i = new Vector2f();
1798 i.x = p1.x + u * (p2.x - p1.x);
1799 i.y = p1.y + u * (p2.y - p1.y);
1800 return Vector2f.sub(i, p3, new Vector2f()).length();
1801 }

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.fadeInOutAndExpire ( final SectorEntityToken  entity,

final float  out 
)

Definition at line 2963 of file Misc.java.

2963 {
2964 entity.addTag(Tags.NON_CLICKABLE);
2965 entity.forceSensorFaderBrightness(0f);
2966 entity.setAlwaysUseSensorFaderBrightness(true);
2967 //entity.getContainingLocation().addScript(new EveryFrameScript() {
2968 entity.addScript(new EveryFrameScript() {
2969 float elapsed = 0f;
2970 public boolean runWhilePaused() {
2971 return false;
2972 }
2973 public boolean isDone() {
2974 return entity.isExpired();
2975 }
2976 public void advance(float amount) {
2977 elapsed += amount;
2978 if (elapsed > in + dur + out) {
2979 entity.setExpired(true);
2980 }
2981 float b = 1f;
2982 if (elapsed < in) {
2983 b = elapsed / in;
2984 } else if (elapsed > in + dur) {
2985 b = 1f - (elapsed - in - dur) / out;
2986 }
2987 if (b < 0) b = 0;
2988 if (b > 1) b = 1;
2989 entity.forceSensorFaderBrightness(Math.min(entity.getSensorFaderBrightness(), b));
2990 entity.setAlwaysUseSensorFaderBrightness(true);
2991 }
2992 });
2993 }

◆ findClosestShipEnemyOf() [2/2]

static ShipAPI com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.findClosestShipEnemyOf ( ShipAPI  ship,
Vector2f  locFromForSorting,
HullSize  smallestToNote,
float  maxRange,
boolean  considerShipRadius,
FindShipFilter  filter 
)
static

Definition at line 2350 of file Misc.java.

2350 {
2351 CombatEngineAPI engine = Global.getCombatEngine();
2352 List<ShipAPI> ships = engine.getShips();
2353 float minDist = Float.MAX_VALUE;
2354 ShipAPI closest = null;
2355 for (ShipAPI other : ships) {
2356 if (other.getHullSize().ordinal() < smallestToNote.ordinal()) continue;
2357 if (other.isShuttlePod()) continue;
2358 if (other.isHulk()) continue;
2359 if (ship.getOwner() != other.getOwner() && other.getOwner() != 100) {
2360 if (filter != null && !filter.matches(other)) continue;
2361
2362 float dist = getDistance(ship.getLocation(), other.getLocation());
2363 float distSort = getDistance(locFromForSorting, other.getLocation());
2364 float radSum = ship.getCollisionRadius() + other.getCollisionRadius();
2365 if (!considerShipRadius) radSum = 0;
2366 if (dist > maxRange + radSum) continue;
2367 if (distSort < minDist) {
2368 closest = other;
2369 minDist = distSort;
2370 }
2371 }
2372 }
2373 return closest;
2374 }

◆ findKth()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.findKth ( float[]  arr,
int  k 
)
static

Definition at line 6000 of file Misc.java.

6000 {
6001 if (arr == null || arr.length <= k || k < 0) {
6002 return -1;
6003 }
6004
6005 int from = 0;
6006 int to = arr.length - 1;
6007
6008 while (from < to) {
6009 int r = from;
6010 int w = to;
6011 float mid = arr[(r + w) / 2];
6012
6013 while (r < w) {
6014 if (arr[r] >= mid) {
6015 float tmp = arr[w];
6016 arr[w] = arr[r];
6017 arr[r] = tmp;
6018 w--;
6019 } else {
6020 r++;
6021 }
6022 }
6023
6024 if (arr[r] > mid) r--;
6025
6026 if (k <= r) {
6027 to = r;
6028 } else {
6029 from = r + 1;
6030 }
6031 }
6032
6033 return arr[k];
6034 }

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.genFractalNoise ( Random  random,

int  y1,

int  y2,

float  spikes 
)

Definition at line 2498 of file Misc.java.

2499 {
2500 if (x1 + 1 >= x2 || y1 + 1 >= y2) return; // no more values to fill
2501
2502 int midX = (x1 + x2) / 2;
2503 int midY = (y1 + y2) / 2;
2504
2505 fill(random, noise, midX, y1, x1, y1, x2, y1, iter, spikes);
2506 fill(random, noise, midX, y2, x1, y2, x2, y2, iter, spikes);
2507 fill(random, noise, x1, midY, x1, y1, x1, y2, iter, spikes);
2508 fill(random, noise, x2, midY, x2, y1, x2, y2, iter, spikes);
2509
2510 // averaging 4 neighboring values
2511 fill(random, noise, midX, midY, midX, y1, midX, y2, iter, spikes);
2512 float midValue1 = noise[midX][midY];
2513 fill(random, noise, midX, midY, x1, midY, x2, midY, iter, spikes);
2514 float midValue2 = noise[midX][midY];
2515 noise[midX][midY] = (midValue1 + midValue2)/2f;
2516
2517 genFractalNoise(random, noise, x1, y1, midX, midY, iter + 1, spikes);
2518 genFractalNoise(random, noise, x1, midY, midX, y2, iter + 1, spikes);
2519 genFractalNoise(random, noise, midX, y1, x2, midY, iter + 1, spikes);
2520 genFractalNoise(random, noise, midX, midY, x2, y2, iter + 1, spikes);
2521 }

◆ getAgoStringForTimestamp()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getAgoStringForTimestamp ( long  timestamp)
static

Definition at line 1452 of file Misc.java.

1452 {
1453 CampaignClockAPI clock = Global.getSector().getClock();
1454 float days = clock.getElapsedDaysSince(timestamp);
1455
1456 if (days <= 1f) {
1457 return "Today";
1458 } else if (days <= 6f) {
1459 return (int)Math.ceil(days) + " days ago";
1460 } else if (days <= 7) {
1461 return "1 week ago";
1462 } else if (days <= 14) {
1463 return "2 weeks ago";
1464 } else if (days <= 21) {
1465 return "3 weeks ago";
1466 } else if (days <= 30 + 14) {
1467 return "1 month ago";
1468 } else if (days < 30 * 2 + 14) {
1469 return "2 months ago";
1470 } else if (days < 30 * 3 + 14) {
1471 return "3 months ago";
1472 } else {
1473 return "Over 3 months ago";
1474 }
1475 }

◆ getAOrAnFor()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getAOrAnFor ( String  word)
static

Probably wrong sometimes...

Returns
"a" or "an" for word.

Definition at line 5822 of file Misc.java.

5822 {
5823 word = word.toLowerCase();
5824 for (String other : new String[] {"euler", "heir", "honest", "hono"}) {
5825 if (word.startsWith(other)) {
5826 return "an";
5827 }
5828 }
5829
5830 if (word.startsWith("hour") && !word.startsWith("houri")) {
5831 return "an";
5832 }
5833
5834 Pattern p;
5835 Matcher m;
5836
5837 for (String regex : new String[] { "^e[uw]", "^onc?e\b", "^uni([^nmd]|mo)", "^u[bcfhjkqrst][aeiou]"}) {
5838 p = Pattern.compile("(?is)" + regex + ".*");
5839 m = p.matcher(word);
5840 if (m.matches()) {
5841 return "a";
5842 }
5843 }
5844
5845 p = Pattern.compile("(?is)" + "^U[NK][AIEO]");
5846 m = p.matcher(word);
5847 if (m.matches()) {
5848 return "a";
5849 }
5850
5851 for (String letter : new String[] { "a", "e", "i", "o", "u" }) {
5852 if (word.startsWith(letter)) {
5853 return "an";
5854 }
5855 }
5856
5857 p = Pattern.compile("(?is)" + "^y(b[lor]|cl[ea]|fere|gg|p[ios]|rou|tt)" + ".*");
5858 m = p.matcher(word);
5859 if (m.matches()) {
5860 return "an";
5861 }
5862
5863 return "a";
5864 }

5447 {
5448 float ownedShip = Global.getSettings().getBonusXP("recoverOwnedShip");
5449 float threshold = Global.getSettings().getBonusXP("recoverNoBonusXPDeploymentPoints");
5450
5451 if (member.getOwner() == 0) {
5452 return ownedShip;
5453 }
5454
5455 float f = 1f - member.getDeploymentPointsCost() / threshold;
5456 if (f < 0) f = 0;
5457 if (f > 1) f = 1;
5458

◆ getClaimingFaction()

static FactionAPI com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getClaimingFaction ( SectorEntityToken  planet)
static

Definition at line 4779 of file Misc.java.

4779 {
4780 int max = 0;
4781 MarketAPI result = null;
4782 List<MarketAPI> markets = Global.getSector().getEconomy().getMarkets(planet.getContainingLocation());
4783 for (MarketAPI curr : markets) {
4784 if (curr.isHidden()) continue;
4785 if (curr.getFaction().isPlayerFaction()) continue;
4786
4787 int score = curr.getSize();
4788 for (MarketAPI other : markets) {
4789 if (other != curr && other.getFaction() == curr.getFaction()) score++;
4790 }
4791 if (isMilitary(curr)) score += 10;
4792 if (score > max) {
4793 JSONObject json = curr.getFaction().getCustom().optJSONObject(Factions.CUSTOM_PUNITIVE_EXPEDITION_DATA);
4794 if (json == null) continue;
4795 boolean territorial = json.optBoolean("territorial");
4796 if (!territorial) continue;
4797
4798 max = score;
4799 result = curr;
4800 }
4801 }
4802 if (result == null) return null;
4803
4804 return result.getFaction();
4805 }

◆ getClosingSpeed()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getClosingSpeed ( Vector2f  p1,
Vector2f  p2,
Vector2f  v1,
Vector2f  v2 
)
static

Definition at line 1323 of file Misc.java.

1323 {
1324 // direction from target to shooter
1325 Vector2f dir = Vector2f.sub(p1, p2, new Vector2f());
1326 normalise(dir);
1327 // velocity of target relative to shooter
1328 Vector2f relVel = Vector2f.sub(v2, v1, new Vector2f());
1329 float closingSpeed = Vector2f.dot(dir, relVel);
1330 return closingSpeed;
1331 }

◆ getColorDist()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getColorDist ( Color  one,
Color  two 
)
static

Definition at line 6297 of file Misc.java.

6297 {
6298 float r = Math.abs(one.getRed() - two.getRed());
6299 float g = Math.abs(one.getGreen() - two.getGreen());
6300 float b = Math.abs(one.getBlue() - two.getBlue());
6301 float a = Math.abs(one.getAlpha() - two.getAlpha());
6302
6303 return (float) Math.sqrt(r * r + g * g + b * b + a * a);
6304 }

◆ getDetailedAgoString()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getDetailedAgoString ( long  timestamp)
static

Definition at line 1477 of file Misc.java.

1477 {
1478 CampaignClockAPI clock = Global.getSector().getClock();
1479 int days = (int) clock.getElapsedDaysSince(timestamp);
1480
1481 if (days == 0) {
1482 return "0 days ago";
1483 } else if (days == 1) {
1484 return "1 day ago";
1485 } else if (days <= 6) {
1486 return (int)Math.ceil(days) + " days ago";
1487 } else if (days <= 7) {
1488 return "1 week ago";
1489 } else if (days <= 14) {
1490 return "2 weeks ago";
1491 } else if (days <= 21) {
1492 return "3 weeks ago";
1493 } else {
1494 int months = days / 30;
1495 if (months <= 12) {
1496 if (months <= 1) {
1497 return "1 month ago";
1498 } else {
1499 return "" + months + " months ago";
1500 }
1501 } else {
1502 int years = months / 12;
1503 if (years <= 1) {
1504 return "1 cycle ago";
1505 } else {
1506 return "" + years + " cycles ago";
1507 }
1508 }
1509 }
1510 }

◆ getDistance() [1/4]

602 {
603// float xDiff = Math.abs(x1 - x2);
604// float yDiff = Math.abs(y1 - y2);

◆ getDistanceFromArc()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getDistanceFromArc ( float  direction,
float  arc,
float  angle 
)
static

Definition at line 3328 of file Misc.java.

3328 {
3329 direction = normalizeAngle(direction);
3330 angle = normalizeAngle(angle);
3331
3332 float dist1 = Math.abs(angle - direction) - arc/2f;
3333 float dist2 = Math.abs(360 - Math.abs(angle - direction)) - arc/2f;
3334
3335 if (dist1 <= 0 || dist2 <= 0) return 0;
3336
3337 return dist1 > dist2 ? dist2 : dist1;
3338 }

◆ getEstimatedOrbitIndex()

static int com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getEstimatedOrbitIndex ( PlanetAPI  planet)
static

Definition at line 2738 of file Misc.java.

2738 {
2739 Vector2f centerLoc = new Vector2f();
2740 float centerRadius = 0;
2741
2742// if (planet.getId().toLowerCase().equals("asharu")) {
2743// System.out.println("sdfwefe");
2744// }
2745
2746 float planetRadius = planet.getRadius();
2747 PlanetAPI parent = null;
2748 PlanetAPI parentParent = null;
2749 if (planet.getOrbitFocus() instanceof PlanetAPI) {
2750 parent = (PlanetAPI) planet.getOrbitFocus();
2751 if (parent.getOrbitFocus() instanceof PlanetAPI) {
2752 parentParent = (PlanetAPI) parent.getOrbitFocus();
2753 }
2754 if (parent.isStar()) {
2755 centerLoc = parent.getLocation();
2756 centerRadius = parent.getRadius();
2757 } else if (parentParent != null && parentParent.isStar()) {
2758 centerLoc = parentParent.getLocation();
2759 centerRadius = parentParent.getRadius();
2760 planetRadius = parent.getRadius();
2761 }
2762 }
2763
2764 float approximateExtraRadiusPerOrbit = 400f;
2765
2766 float dist = Misc.getDistance(centerLoc, planet.getLocation());
2767 int orbitIndex = (int) ((dist - centerRadius - planetRadius -
2768 StarSystemGenerator.STARTING_RADIUS_STAR_BASE - StarSystemGenerator.STARTING_RADIUS_STAR_RANGE * 0.5f) /
2769 (StarSystemGenerator.BASE_INCR * 1.25f + approximateExtraRadiusPerOrbit));
2770 if (orbitIndex == 0) {
2771 orbitIndex = (int) ((dist - centerRadius - planetRadius -
2772 StarSystemGenerator.STARTING_RADIUS_STAR_BASE - StarSystemGenerator.STARTING_RADIUS_STAR_RANGE * 0.5f) /
2773 (StarSystemGenerator.BASE_INCR * 1.25f));
2774 }
2775 if (orbitIndex < 0) orbitIndex = 0;
2776
2777 return orbitIndex;
2778 }

◆ getFleetRadiusTerrainEffectMult()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getFleetRadiusTerrainEffectMult ( CampaignFleetAPI  fleet)
static

Definition at line 4664 of file Misc.java.

4664 {
4665 float min = Global.getSettings().getBaseFleetSelectionRadius() + Global.getSettings().getFleetSelectionRadiusPerUnitSize();
4666 float max = Global.getSettings().getMaxFleetSelectionRadius();
4667 float radius = fleet.getRadius();
4668
4669 //radius = 1000;
4670
4671 float mult = (radius - min) / (max - min);
4672 if (mult > 1) mult = 1;
4673 //if (mult < 0) mult = 0;
4674 if (mult < MIN_TERRAIN_EFFECT_MULT) mult = MIN_TERRAIN_EFFECT_MULT;
4675 //mult = MIN_BURN_PENALTY + mult * BURN_PENALTY_RANGE;
4676
4677 float skillMod = fleet.getCommanderStats().getDynamic().getValue(Stats.NAVIGATION_PENALTY_MULT);
4678 mult *= skillMod;
4679
4680 mult = Math.round(mult * 100f) / 100f;
4681
4682 return mult;
4683 }

◆ getFPForVariantId()

static int com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getFPForVariantId ( String  variantId)

4189 {

5051 {
5052 if (result == null || baseDamage <= 0) return baseSize;
5053
5054 float sd = result.getDamageToShields() + result.getOverMaxDamageToShields();
5055 float ad = result.getTotalDamageToArmor();
5056 float hd = result.getDamageToHull();
5057 float ed = result.getEmpDamage();

com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getHitGlowSize

Definition: Misc.java:5051

◆ getHitGlowSize() [2/2]

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getHitGlowSize ( float  baseSize,
float  baseDamage,
DamageType  type,
float  sd,
float  ad,
float  hd,
float  ed 
)
static

Definition at line 5063 of file Misc.java.

5063 {
5064
5065 float minBonus = 0f;
5066 if (type == DamageType.KINETIC) {
5067 sd *= 0.5f;
5068 //if (sd > 0) minBonus = 0.1f;
5069 } else if (type == DamageType.HIGH_EXPLOSIVE) {
5070 ad *= 0.5f;
5071 if (ad > 0) minBonus = 0.1f;
5072 } else if (type == DamageType.FRAGMENTATION) {
5073 if (hd > 0) {
5074 minBonus = 0.2f * (hd / (hd + ad));
5075 }
5076 sd *= 2f;
5077 ad *= 2f;
5078 hd *= 2f;
5079 }
5080
5081 float totalDamage = sd + ad + hd;
5082 if (totalDamage <= 0) return baseSize;
5083
5084 // emp damage makes the hitglow normal-sized, but not bigger
5085 if (totalDamage < baseDamage) {
5086 totalDamage += ed;
5087 if (totalDamage > baseDamage) {
5088 totalDamage = baseDamage;
5089 }
5090 }
5091
5092 float minSize = 15f;
5093 float minMult = minSize / baseSize;
5094 minMult = Math.max(minMult, 0.67f + minBonus);
5095 if (minMult > 1) minMult = 1;
5096
5097 float mult = totalDamage / baseDamage;
5098 if (mult < minMult) mult = minMult;
5099
5100 float maxMult = 1.5f;
5101 if (mult > maxMult) mult = maxMult;
5102 //mult = maxMult;
5103 //mult = 1f;
5104 //System.out.println("Mult: " + mult);
5105 return baseSize * mult;
5106 }

◆ getInterceptPoint() [1/2]

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getInterceptPoint ( CampaignFleetAPI  from,
SectorEntityToken  to 
)
static

Definition at line 3654 of file Misc.java.

3654 {
3655
3656 //if (true) return new Vector2f(to.getLocation());
3657 //Vector2f v1 = new Vector2f(from.getVelocity());
3658 //Vector2f v2 = new Vector2f(to.getVelocity());
3659 Vector2f v2 = Vector2f.sub(to.getVelocity(), from.getVelocity(), new Vector2f());
3660
3661 float s1 = from.getTravelSpeed();
3662 float s2 = v2.length();
3663
3664 if (s1 < 10) s1 = 10;
3665 if (s2 < 10) s2 = 10;
3666
3667 Vector2f p1 = new Vector2f(from.getLocation());
3668 Vector2f p2 = new Vector2f(to.getLocation());
3669
3670 float dist = getDistance(p1, p2);
3671 float time = dist / s1;
3672 float maxTime = dist / s2 * 0.75f;
3673 if (time > maxTime) time = maxTime; // to ensure intercept point is never behind the from fleet
3674
3675 Vector2f p3 = getUnitVectorAtDegreeAngle(getAngleInDegrees(v2));
3676
3677 p3.scale(time * s2);
3678 Vector2f.add(p2, p3, p3);
3679
3680 Vector2f overshoot = getUnitVectorAtDegreeAngle(getAngleInDegrees(p1, p3));
3681 overshoot.scale(3000f);
3682 Vector2f.add(p3, overshoot, p3);
3683
3684 return p3;
3685 }

◆ getInterceptPointBasic()

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getInterceptPointBasic ( SectorEntityToken  from,
SectorEntityToken  to 
)
static

Definition at line 1365 of file Misc.java.

1365 {
1366 float dist = getDistance(from.getLocation(), to.getLocation()) - from.getRadius() - to.getRadius();
1367 if (dist <= 0) return new Vector2f(to.getLocation());
1368
1369 float closingSpeed = getClosingSpeed(from.getLocation(), to.getLocation(), from.getVelocity(), to.getVelocity());
1370 if (closingSpeed <= 10) return new Vector2f(to.getLocation());
1371
1372 Vector2f toTarget = getUnitVectorAtDegreeAngle(Misc.getAngleInDegrees(from.getLocation(), to.getLocation()));
1373 Vector2f vel = new Vector2f(from.getVelocity());
1374 normalise(vel);
1375 float dot = Vector2f.dot(toTarget, vel);
1376 if (dot < 0) return new Vector2f(to.getLocation());
1377// if (to.isPlayerFleet()) {
1378// System.out.println("23rwefe");
1379// }
1380 float time = dist / closingSpeed;
1381
1382 Vector2f point = new Vector2f(to.getVelocity());
1383 point.scale(time);
1384 Vector2f.add(point, to.getLocation(), point);
1385 return point;
1386 }

◆ getJoined() [2/2]

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getJoined ( String  joiner,
String ...  strings 
)
static

Definition at line 866 of file Misc.java.

866 {
867 if (strings.length == 1) return strings[0];
868
869 String result = "";
870 for (int i = 0; i < strings.length - 1; i++) {
871 result += strings[i] + ", ";
872 }
873 if (!result.isEmpty()) {
874 result = result.substring(0, result.length() - 2);
875 }
876 if (strings.length > 2) {
877 if (joiner.isEmpty()) {
878 result += ", " + strings[strings.length - 1];
879 } else {
880 result += ", " + joiner + " " + strings[strings.length - 1];
881 }
882 } else if (strings.length == 2) {
883 if (joiner.isEmpty()) {
884 result += ", " + strings[strings.length - 1];
885 } else {
886 result += " " + joiner + " " + strings[strings.length - 1];
887 }
888 }
889 return result;
890 }

3992 {
3993 ImmigrationPlugin plugin = getImmigrationPlugin(market);

3996

◆ getMemberStrength() [2/2]

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getMemberStrength ( FleetMemberAPI  member,
boolean  withHull,
boolean  withQuality,
boolean  withCaptain 
)
static

Definition at line 4567 of file Misc.java.

4567 {
4568 float str = member.getMemberStrength();
4569 float min = 0.25f;
4570 if (str < min) str = min;
4571
4572 float quality = 0.5f;
4573 if (member.getFleetData() != null && member.getFleetData().getFleet() != null) {
4574 CampaignFleetAPI fleet = member.getFleetData().getFleet();
4575 if (fleet.getInflater() != null && !fleet.isInflated()) {
4576 quality = fleet.getInflater().getQuality();
4577 } else {
4578 BattleAPI battle = fleet.getBattle();
4579 CampaignFleetAPI source = battle == null ? null : battle.getSourceFleet(member);
4580 if (source != null && source.getInflater() != null &&
4581 !source.isInflated()) {
4582 quality = source.getInflater().getQuality();
4583 } else {
4584 float dmods = DModManager.getNumDMods(member.getVariant());
4585 quality = 1f - Global.getSettings().getFloat("qualityPerDMod") * dmods;
4586 if (quality < 0) quality = 0f;
4587 }
4588 }
4589 }
4590
4591 if (member.isStation()) {
4592 quality = 1f;
4593 }
4594
4595
4596 float captainMult = 1f;
4597 if (member.getCaptain() != null) {
4598 float captainLevel = (member.getCaptain().getStats().getLevel() - 1f);
4599 if (member.isStation()) {
4600 captainMult += captainLevel / (MAX_OFFICER_LEVEL * 2f);
4601 } else {
4602 captainMult += captainLevel / MAX_OFFICER_LEVEL;
4603 }
4604 }
4605
4606 if (withQuality) {
4607 //str *= Math.max(0.25f, 0.5f + quality);
4608 str *= Math.max(0.25f, 0.8f + quality * 0.4f);
4609 }
4610 if (withHull) {
4611 str *= 0.5f + 0.5f * member.getStatus().getHullFraction();
4612 }
4613 if (withCaptain) {
4614 str *= captainMult;
4615 }
4616 //System.out.println("Member: " + member + ", str: " + str);
4617
4618 return str;
4619 }
com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.MAX_OFFICER_LEVEL
static float MAX_OFFICER_LEVEL
Definition: Misc.java:229

Definition at line 2636 of file Misc.java.

2636 {
2637 //boolean some = false, all = true;

2639 boolean empty = true;

2641 if (planet.isStar()) continue;
2642 MarketAPI market = planet.getMarket();
2643 if (market == null) continue;
2644
2645 empty = false;

2647 if (level.ordinal() < minLevel.ordinal()) {
2648 minLevel = level;
2649 }
2650 }
2651

2653 if (system.isEnteredByPlayer() && empty) minLevel = SurveyLevel.FULL;
2654
2655 return minLevel;
2656
2657

◆ getNearestStationInSupportRange()

static Pair< SectorEntityToken, CampaignFleetAPI > com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getNearestStationInSupportRange ( CampaignFleetAPI  from)
static

pair.one can be null if a stand-alone, non-market station is being returned in pair.two.

Parameters
from
Returns

Definition at line 4508 of file Misc.java.

4508 {
4509 SectorEntityToken closestEntity = null;
4510 CampaignFleetAPI closest = null;
4511 float minDist = Float.MAX_VALUE;
4512 for (SectorEntityToken station : from.getContainingLocation().getCustomEntitiesWithTag(Tags.STATION)) {
4513 CampaignFleetAPI fleet = Misc.getStationFleet(station);
4514 if (fleet == null || fleet.isEmpty()) continue;
4515
4516 if (!isStationInSupportRange(from, fleet)) continue;
4517 float dist = Misc.getDistance(from.getLocation(), station.getLocation());
4518
4519 if (dist < minDist) {
4520 closest = fleet;
4521 closestEntity = station;
4522 minDist = dist;
4523 }
4524 }
4525
4526 // remnant stations and other fleets that are in station mode, w/o a related market
4527 for (CampaignFleetAPI fleet : from.getContainingLocation().getFleets()) {
4528 if (!fleet.isStationMode()) continue;
4529 if (fleet.isHidden()) continue;
4530
4531 if (!isStationInSupportRange(from, fleet)) continue;
4532 float dist = Misc.getDistance(from.getLocation(), fleet.getLocation());
4533
4534 if (dist < minDist) {
4535 closest = fleet;
4536 closestEntity = null;
4537 minDist = dist;
4538 }
4539 }
4540
4541 if (closest == null) return null;
4542
4543 return new Pair<SectorEntityToken, CampaignFleetAPI>(closestEntity, closest);
4544 }

4389 {

◆ getRandom()

static Random com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getRandom ( long  seed,
int  level 
)
static

Definition at line 2781 of file Misc.java.

2781 {
2782 if (seed == 0) return random;
2783
2784 Random r = new Random(seed);
2785 for (int i = 0; i < level; i++) {
2786 r.nextLong();
2787 }
2788 return new Random(r.nextLong());
2789 }

5000 {
5001 Color relColor = new Color(125,125,125,255);
5002 if (rel > 1) rel = 1;
5003 if (rel < -1) rel = -1;
5004
5005 if (rel > 0) {
5006 relColor = Misc.interpolateColor(relColor, Misc.getPositiveHighlightColor(), Math.max(0.15f, rel));
5007 } else if (rel < 0) {
5008 relColor = Misc.interpolateColor(relColor, Misc.getNegativeHighlightColor(), Math.max(0.15f, -rel));
5009 }

◆ getRounded()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getRounded ( float  in)
static

Definition at line 623 of file Misc.java.

623 {
624 if (in <= 10) return Math.max(1, (int) in);
625 float pow = (int) Math.log10(in);
626 float div = (float) Math.pow(10, Math.max(0, pow - 1));
627 if (pow == 1) div = 10;
628 return (int) Math.round(in / div) * div;
629 }

◆ getRoundedValue()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getRoundedValue ( float  value)
static

Definition at line 631 of file Misc.java.

631 {
632 if (Math.abs((float)Math.round(value) - value) < 0.0001f) {
633 //if (value > 10 || value < -10) {
634 return String.format("%d", (int) Math.round(value));
635 //} else {
636 //return String.format("%.1f", value);
637 //}
638 } else if ((int) Math.round((value * 100f)) == (int) Math.round((value * 10f)) * 10) {
639 return (value > 10 || value < -10) ? "" + (int) Math.round(value) : String.format("%.1f", value);
640 } else {
641 return (value > 10 || value < -10) ? "" + (int) Math.round(value) : String.format("%.2f", value);
642 }
643 }

◆ getRoundedValueFloat()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getRoundedValueFloat ( float  value)
static

Definition at line 645 of file Misc.java.

645 {
646 if (Math.abs((float)Math.round(value) - value) < 0.0001f) {
647 return (int) Math.round(value);
648 } else if ((int) Math.round((value * 100f)) == (int) Math.round((value * 10f)) * 10) {
649 return (value > 10 || value < -10) ? (int) Math.round(value) :
650 (Math.round(value * 10f) / 10f);
651 } else {
652 return (value > 10 || value < -10) ? (int) Math.round(value) :
653 (Math.round(value * 100f) / 100f);
654 }
655 }

◆ getSalvageSeed()

static long com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getSalvageSeed ( SectorEntityToken  entity)
static

Definition at line 3862 of file Misc.java.

3862 {
3863 long seed = entity.getMemoryWithoutUpdate().getLong(MemFlags.SALVAGE_SEED);
3864 if (seed == 0) {
3865 //seed = new Random().nextLong();
3866 String id = entity.getId();
3867 if (id == null) id = genUID();
3868 seed = seedUniquifier() ^ (entity.getId().hashCode() * 17000);
3869 Random r = new Random(seed);
3870 for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
3871 r.nextLong();
3872 }
3873 long result = r.nextLong();
3874 entity.getMemoryWithoutUpdate().set(MemFlags.SALVAGE_SEED, result);
3875 return result;
3876 }
3877 return seed;
3878 }

◆ getShieldedCargoFraction()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getShieldedCargoFraction ( CampaignFleetAPI  fleet)
static

Definition at line 1225 of file Misc.java.

1225 {
1226 float shielded = 0f;
1227 for (FleetMemberAPI member : fleet.getFleetData().getMembersListCopy()) {
1228 if (member.isMothballed()) continue;
1229 if (member.getVariant().hasHullMod(HullMods.SHIELDED_CARGO_HOLDS)) {
1230 shielded += member.getCargoCapacity();
1231 }
1232 }
1233 float max = fleet.getCargo().getMaxCapacity();
1234 if (max < 1) return 0f;
1235 return shielded / max;
1236 }

◆ getShipWeight() [2/2]

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getShipWeight ( ShipAPI  ship,
boolean  adjustForNonCombat 
)
static

Definition at line 5764 of file Misc.java.

5764 {
5765 if (ship.isDrone()) return 0.1f;
5766 boolean nonCombat = ship.isNonCombat(false);
5767 float weight = 0;
5768 switch (ship.getHullSize()) {
5769 case CAPITAL_SHIP: weight += 8; break;
5770 case CRUISER: weight += 4; break;
5771 case DESTROYER: weight += 2; break;
5772 case FRIGATE: weight += 1; break;
5773 case FIGHTER: weight += 1; break;
5774 }
5775 if (nonCombat && adjustForNonCombat) weight *= 0.25f;
5776 if (ship.isDrone()) weight *= 0.1f;
5777 return weight;
5778 }

◆ getSpawnChanceMult()

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getSpawnChanceMult ( Vector2f  locInHyper)
static

Definition at line 2095 of file Misc.java.

2095 {
2096 if (Global.getSector().getPlayerFleet() == null) return 1f;
2097
2098 float min = Global.getSettings().getFloat("minFleetSpawnChanceMult");
2099 float range = Global.getSettings().getFloat("minFleetSpawnChanceRangeLY");
2100
2101 Vector2f playerLoc = Global.getSector().getPlayerFleet().getLocationInHyperspace();
2102 float distLY = getDistanceLY(playerLoc, locInHyper);
2103
2104 float f = (1f - Math.min(1f, distLY/range));
2105 return min + (1f - min) * f * f;
2106 }

◆ getStarId()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getStarId ( PlanetAPI  planet)
static

Definition at line 2603 of file Misc.java.

2603 {
2604 String starId = planet.getContainingLocation().getId();
2605 if (planet.getContainingLocation() instanceof StarSystemAPI) {
2606 StarSystemAPI system = (StarSystemAPI) planet.getContainingLocation();
2607 if (system.getStar() != null) {
2608 starId = system.getStar().getId();
2609 }
2610 }
2611 if (planet.getOrbitFocus() instanceof PlanetAPI) {
2612 PlanetAPI parent = (PlanetAPI) planet.getOrbitFocus();
2613 if (parent.isStar()) {
2614 starId = parent.getId();
2615 } else {
2616 if (parent.getOrbitFocus() instanceof PlanetAPI) {
2617 parent = (PlanetAPI) parent.getOrbitFocus();
2618 if (parent.isStar()) {
2619 starId = parent.getId();
2620 }
2621 }
2622 }
2623 }
2624 return starId;
2625 }

◆ getStrengthDesc()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getStrengthDesc ( float  strAdjustedFP)
static

Definition at line 4738 of file Misc.java.

4738 {
4739 String strDesc;
4740 if (strAdjustedFP < 50) {
4741 strDesc = "very weak";
4742 } else if (strAdjustedFP < 150) {
4743 strDesc = "somewhat weak";
4744 } else if (strAdjustedFP < 300) {
4745 strDesc = "fairly capable";
4746 } else if (strAdjustedFP < 750) {
4747 strDesc = "fairly strong";
4748 } else if (strAdjustedFP < 1250) {
4749 strDesc = "strong";
4750 } else {
4751 strDesc = "very strong";
4752 }
4753 return strDesc;
4754 }

◆ getStringForDays()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getStringForDays ( int  days)
static

Definition at line 1534 of file Misc.java.

1534 {
1535 if (days <= 1f) {
1536 return "a day";
1537 } else if (days <= 6f) {
1538 return "a few days";
1539 } else if (days <= 7 + 6) {
1540 return "a week";
1541 } else if (days <= 14 + 6) {
1542 return "two weeks";
1543 } else if (days <= 21 + 8) {
1544 return "three weeks";
1545 } else if (days <= 30 + 29) {
1546 return "a month";
1547 } else if (days < 30 * 2 + 29) {
1548 return "two months";
1549 } else if (days < 30 * 3 + 29) {
1550 return "three months";
1551 } else {
1552 return "many months";
1553 }
1554 }

◆ getSystemsInRange()

static List< StarSystemAPI > com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getSystemsInRange ( SectorEntityToken  from,

boolean  nonEmpty,
float  maxRange 
)
static

3407 {
3408 List<StarSystemAPI> systems = new ArrayList<StarSystemAPI>();
3409
3410 for (StarSystemAPI system : Global.getSector().getStarSystems()) {
3411 if (exclude != null && exclude.contains(system)) continue;
3412
3413 float dist = Misc.getDistance(from.getLocationInHyperspace(), system.getLocation());
3414 if (dist > maxRange) continue;
3415 if (nonEmpty && !systemHasPlanets(system)) continue;
3416
3417 systems.add(system);
3418 }
3419
3420 return systems;
3421 }

◆ getVisibleFleets()

static List< CampaignFleetAPI > com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.getVisibleFleets ( SectorEntityToken  from,
boolean  includeSensorContacts 
)
static

Definition at line 3512 of file Misc.java.

3512 {
3513 List<CampaignFleetAPI> result = new ArrayList<CampaignFleetAPI>();
3514 for (CampaignFleetAPI other : from.getContainingLocation().getFleets()) {
3515 if (from == other) continue;
3516 VisibilityLevel level = other.getVisibilityLevelTo(from);
3517 if (level == VisibilityLevel.COMPOSITION_AND_FACTION_DETAILS || level == VisibilityLevel.COMPOSITION_DETAILS) {
3518 result.add(other);
3519 } else if (level == VisibilityLevel.SENSOR_CONTACT && includeSensorContacts) {
3520 result.add(other);
3521 }
3522 }
3523 return result;
3524 }

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.hasSModdableBuiltIns ( ShipVariantAPI  variant)
static

Definition at line 5295 of file Misc.java.

5295 {
5296 if (!CAN_SMOD_BUILT_IN || variant == null) return false;
5297 int num = 0;
5298 for (String id : variant.getHullMods()) {
5299 HullModSpecAPI spec = Global.getSettings().getHullModSpec(id);
5300 if (spec.isHidden()) continue;
5301 if (spec.isHiddenEverywhere()) continue;
5302 if (spec.hasTag(Tags.HULLMOD_DMOD)) continue;

5304 spec.getEffect().hasSModEffect() && !spec.getEffect().isSModEffectAPenalty() &&
5305 !variant.getSModdedBuiltIns().contains(id)) {
5306 num++;
5307 }
5308 }
5309 return num > 0;
5310 }

◆ increaseMarketHostileTimeout()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.increaseMarketHostileTimeout ( MarketAPI  market,
float  days 
)
static

Definition at line 4622 of file Misc.java.

4622 {
4623 MemoryAPI mem = market.getMemoryWithoutUpdate();
4624 float expire = days;
4625 if (mem.contains(MemFlags.MEMORY_KEY_PLAYER_HOSTILE_ACTIVITY_NEAR_MARKET)) {
4626 expire += mem.getExpire(MemFlags.MEMORY_KEY_PLAYER_HOSTILE_ACTIVITY_NEAR_MARKET);
4627 }
4628 if (expire > 180) expire = 180;
4629 if (expire > 0) {
4630 mem.set(MemFlags.MEMORY_KEY_PLAYER_HOSTILE_ACTIVITY_NEAR_MARKET, true, expire);
4631 }

◆ initNoise()

static float[][] com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.initNoise ( Random  random,
int  w,
int  h,
float  spikes 
)
static

Definition at line 2483 of file Misc.java.

2483 {
2484 if (random == null) random = Misc.random;
2485 float [][] noise = new float [w][h];
2486 for (int i = 0; i < noise.length; i++) {
2487 for (int j = 0; j < noise[0].length; j++) {
2488 noise[i][j] = -1f;
2489 }
2490 }
2491 noise[0][0] = random.nextFloat() * spikes;
2492 noise[0][noise[0].length - 1] = random.nextFloat() * spikes;
2493 noise[noise.length - 1][0] = random.nextFloat() * spikes;
2494 noise[noise.length - 1][noise[0].length - 1] = random.nextFloat() * spikes;
2495 return noise;
2496 }

static float com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.interpolate ( float  from,

)
static

Definition at line 1260 of file Misc.java.

1260 {
1261 to = from + (to - from) * progress;
1262 return to;

◆ interpolateColor()

1239 {
1240 float red = (float)from.getRed() + ((float)to.getRed() - (float)from.getRed()) * progress;
1241 float green = (float)from.getGreen() + ((float)to.getGreen() - (float)from.getGreen()) * progress;
1242 float blue = (float)from.getBlue() + ((float)to.getBlue() - (float)from.getBlue()) * progress;
1243 float alpha = (float)from.getAlpha() + ((float)to.getAlpha() - (float)from.getAlpha()) * progress;
1244 red = Math.round(red);
1245 green = Math.round(green);
1246 blue = Math.round(blue);
1247 alpha = Math.round(alpha);
1248 return new Color((int)red, (int)green, (int)blue, (int)alpha);

◆ intersectLines()

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.intersectLines ( Vector2f  a1,
Vector2f  a2,
Vector2f  b1,
Vector2f  b2 
)
static

Definition at line 1920 of file Misc.java.

1920 {
1921 float denom = (b2.y - b1.y) * (a2.x - a1.x) - (b2.x - b1.x) * (a2.y - a1.y);
1922 float numUa = (b2.x - b1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (b2.y - b1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x);
1923 float numUb = (a2.x - a1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (a2.y - a1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x);
1924
1925 if (denom == 0 && !(numUa == 0 && numUb == 0)) { // parallel, not coincident
1926 return null;
1927 }
1928
1929 if (denom == 0 && numUa == 0 && numUb == 0) { // coincident
1930 return new Vector2f(a1);
1931 }
1932
1933 float Ua = numUa / denom;
1934 float Ub = numUb / denom;
1935 Vector2f result = new Vector2f();
1936 result.x = a1.x + Ua * (a2.x - a1.x);
1937 result.y = a1.y + Ua * (a2.y - a1.y);
1938 return result;
1939 }

◆ intersectSegmentAndCircle()

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.intersectSegmentAndCircle ( Vector2f  p1,
Vector2f  p2,
Vector2f  p3,
float  r 
)
static

Going from p1 to p2. Returns the closer intersection.

Parameters
p1
p2
p3
r
Returns

Definition at line 1952 of file Misc.java.

1952 {
1953
1954 float uNom = (p3.x - p1.x) * (p2.x - p1.x) + (p3.y - p1.y) * (p2.y - p1.y);
1955 float uDenom = (p2.x - p1.x) * (p2.x - p1.x) + (p2.y - p1.y) * (p2.y - p1.y);
1956
1957 Vector2f closest = new Vector2f();
1958 if (uDenom == 0) { // p1 and p2 are coincident
1959 closest.set(p1);
1960 } else {
1961 float u = uNom / uDenom;
1962 closest.x = p1.x + u * (p2.x - p1.x);
1963 closest.y = p1.y + u * (p2.y - p1.y);
1964 }
1965
1966 float distSq = (closest.x - p3.x) * (closest.x - p3.x) + (closest.y - p3.y) * (closest.y - p3.y);
1967 if (distSq > r * r) { // closest point is farther than radius
1968 //System.out.println("shorted");
1969 return null;
1970 } else if (uDenom == 0) {
1971 return closest; // in the case where p1==p2 and they're inside the circle, return p1.
1972 }
1973
1974 float a = (p2.x - p1.x) * (p2.x - p1.x) + (p2.y - p1.y) * (p2.y - p1.y);
1975 float b = 2f * ( (p2.x - p1.x) * (p1.x - p3.x) + (p2.y - p1.y) *
1976 (p1.y - p3.y) );
1977 float c = p3.x * p3.x + p3.y * p3.y + p1.x * p1.x + p1.y * p1.y - 2f
1978 * (p3.x * p1.x + p3.y * p1.y) - r * r;
1979
1980 float bb4ac = b * b - 4f * a * c;
1981
1982 if (bb4ac < 0) return null;
1983
1984 float mu1 = (-b + (float) Math.sqrt(bb4ac)) / (2 * a);
1985 float mu2 = (-b - (float) Math.sqrt(bb4ac)) / (2 * a);
1986
1987 float minMu = mu1;
1988 if ((mu2 < minMu && mu2 >= 0) || minMu < 0) minMu = mu2;
1989
1990 if (minMu < 0 || minMu > 1) {
1991 float p2DistSq = (p2.x - p3.x) * (p2.x - p3.x) + (p2.y - p3.y) * (p2.y - p3.y);
1992 if (p2DistSq <= r * r) return p2;
1993 else return null;
1994 }
1995 //System.out.println("mu1: " + mu1 + ", mu2: " + mu2);
1996
1997 Vector2f result = new Vector2f();
1998 result.x = p1.x + minMu * (p2.x - p1.x);
1999 result.y = p1.y + minMu * (p2.y - p1.y);
2000
2001 return result;
2002 }

◆ intersectSegments()

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.intersectSegments ( Vector2f  a1,
Vector2f  a2,
Vector2f  b1,
Vector2f  b2 
)
static

Definition at line 1862 of file Misc.java.

1862 {
1863 float denom = (b2.y - b1.y) * (a2.x - a1.x) - (b2.x - b1.x) * (a2.y - a1.y);
1864 float numUa = (b2.x - b1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (b2.y - b1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x);
1865 float numUb = (a2.x - a1.x) * (a1.y - b1.y) - (a2.y - a1.y) * (a1.x - b1.x);
1866
1867 if (denom == 0 && !(numUa == 0 && numUb == 0)) { // parallel, not coincident
1868 return null;
1869 }
1870
1871 if (denom == 0 && numUa == 0 && numUb == 0) { // coincident
1872 float minX, minY, maxX, maxY;
1873 if (a1.x < a2.x) {
1874 minX = a1.x;
1875 maxX = a2.x;
1876 } else {
1877 minX = a2.x;
1878 maxX = a1.x;
1879 }
1880 if (a1.y < a2.y) {
1881 minY = a1.y;
1882 maxY = a2.y;
1883 } else {
1884 minY = a2.y;
1885 maxY = a1.y;
1886 }
1887 // if either one of the endpoints in segment b is between the points in segment a,
1888 // return that endpoint as the intersection. Otherwise, no intersection.
1889 if (b1.x >= minX && b1.x <= maxX && b1.y >= minY && b1.y <= maxY) {
1890 return new Vector2f(b1);
1891 } else if (b2.x >= minX && b2.x <= maxX && b2.y >= minY && b2.y <= maxY) {
1892 return new Vector2f(b2);
1893 } else {
1894 return null;
1895 }
1896 }
1897
1898 float Ua = numUa / denom;
1899 float Ub = numUb / denom;
1900 if (Ua >=0 && Ua <= 1 && Ub >= 0 && Ub <= 1) { // segments intersect
1901 Vector2f result = new Vector2f();
1902// if (Ua <= 0.001f) {
1903// result.x = a1.x;
1904// result.y = a1.y;
1905// } else if (Ua >= 0.999f) {
1906// result.x = a2.x;
1907// result.y = a2.y;
1908// } else {
1909 result.x = a1.x + Ua * (a2.x - a1.x);
1910 result.y = a1.y + Ua * (a2.y - a1.y);
1911// }
1912 return result;
1913 } else { // lines intersect, but segments do not
1914 return null;
1915 }
1916
1917 }

1210 {

1217

1219 if (check <= two) return true;
1220 if (check >= one) return true;

1669 {

1671

1674 float dir = test;
1675 if (dir < 0) dir = 360 + dir;

1681 if (arcTo > 360) arcTo -= 360;
1682

1684 if (dir >= arcFrom && arcFrom > arcTo) return true;
1685 if (dir <= arcTo && arcFrom > arcTo) return true;
1686 return false;

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.isInsignificant ( CampaignFleetAPI  fleet)

Whether it prevents salvage, surveying, etc. But NOT things that require only being seen to ruin them, such as SpySat deployments.

Parameters

5934 {

5941 EncounterOption opt = fleet.getAI().pickEncounterOption(null, pf);
5942 if (opt == EncounterOption.DISENGAGE || opt == EncounterOption.HOLD_VS_STRONGER) {
5943 return true;

5946 return false;
5947 }
5948 }

5950 int otherCount = fleet.getFleetSizeCount();
5951
5952 return otherCount <= pfCount / 4;

◆ isPointInBounds()

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.isPointInBounds ( Vector2f  p1,
List< Vector2f >  bounds 
)
static

Definition at line 1832 of file Misc.java.

1832 {
1833 Vector2f p2 = new Vector2f(p1);
1834 p2.x += 10000;
1835 int count = 0;
1836 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
1837 for (int j = 0; j < bounds.size() - 1; j++) {
1838 Vector2f s1 = bounds.get(j);
1839 Vector2f s2 = bounds.get(j + 1);
1840 Vector2f p = intersectSegments(p1, p2, s1, s2);
1841 if (p != null) {
1842 if (Math.abs(p.x - s1.x) < 0.001f &&
1843 Math.abs(p.y - s1.y) < 0.001f) {
1844 continue; // JUST the first point, (p1, p2]
1845 }
1846 if (areSegmentsCoincident(p1, p2, s1, s2)) {
1847 continue;
1848 }
1849 count++;
1850 }
1851 }
1852 if (i == 0 && count % 2 == 1) {
1853 count = 0;
1854 p2.y += 100;
1855 } else {
1856 break;
1857 }
1858 }
1859 return count % 2 == 1;
1860 }

◆ isSameCargo()

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.isSameCargo ( CargoAPI  baseOne,
CargoAPI  baseTwo 
)
static

Definition at line 3526 of file Misc.java.

3526 {
3527 CargoAPI one = Global.getFactory().createCargo(true);
3528 one.addAll(baseOne);
3529 one.sort();
3530
3531 CargoAPI two = Global.getFactory().createCargo(true);
3532 two.addAll(baseTwo);
3533 two.sort();
3534
3535
3536 if (one.getStacksCopy().size() != two.getStacksCopy().size()) return false;
3537
3538 List<CargoStackAPI> stacks1 = one.getStacksCopy();
3539 List<CargoStackAPI> stacks2 = two.getStacksCopy();
3540 for (int i = 0; i < stacks1.size(); i++) {
3541 CargoStackAPI s1 = stacks1.get(i);
3542 CargoStackAPI s2 = stacks2.get(i);
3543
3544 if ((s1 == null || s2 == null) && s1 != s2) return false;
3545 if (s1.getSize() != s2.getSize()) return false;
3546 if (s1.getType() != s2.getType()) return false;
3547 if ((s1.getData() == null || s2.getData() == null) && s1.getData() != s2.getData()) return false;
3548 if (!s1.getData().equals(s2.getData())) return false;
3549 }
3550
3551
3552 return true;
3553 }

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.isShipRecoverable ( FleetMemberAPI  member,

)

Definition at line 3091 of file Misc.java.

3091 {

3093 //Random rand = new Random(1000000 * (member.getId().hashCode() + Global.getSector().getClock().getDay()));

3095 if (!member.getVariant().getSMods().isEmpty()) {
3096 return true;

3099 return true;
3100 }
3101 }
3102 if (member.getVariant().hasTag(Tags.VARIANT_ALWAYS_RECOVERABLE)) {
3103 return true;
3104 }
3105 Random rand = new Random(1000000 * member.getId().hashCode() + Global.getSector().getPlayerBattleSeed());
3106 //rand = new Random();
3107 float chance = Global.getSettings().getFloat("baseShipRecoveryChance");
3108 if (own) {
3109 chance = Global.getSettings().getFloat("baseOwnShipRecoveryChance");
3110 }
3111 chance = member.getStats().getDynamic().getMod(Stats.INDIVIDUAL_SHIP_RECOVERY_MOD).computeEffective(chance);
3112 if (recoverer != null) {
3113 chance = recoverer.getStats().getDynamic().getMod(Stats.SHIP_RECOVERY_MOD).computeEffective(chance);
3114 if (useOfficerRecovery) {
3115 chance = recoverer.getStats().getDynamic().getMod(Stats.OFFICER_SHIP_RECOVERY_MOD).computeEffective(chance);
3116 }
3117 }
3118 chance *= chanceMult;
3119
3120 if (chance < 0) chance = 0;
3121 if (chance > 1f) chance = 1f;
3122 boolean recoverable = rand.nextFloat() < chance;
3123
3124// System.out.println("Recovery for " + member.getHullSpec().getHullId() +
3125// "(" + member.getId().hashCode() + "): " + chance + " (" + recoverable + ")");
3126 return recoverable;
3127 }

◆ mapToEnum() [2/2]

static< T extends Enum< T > T com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.mapToEnum ( JSONObject  json,
String  key,
Class< T >  enumType,
T  defaultOption,
boolean  required 
) throws JSONException
static

Definition at line 2380 of file Misc.java.

2380 {
2381 String val = json.optString(key);
2382 if (val == null || val.equals("")) {
2383 if (defaultOption == null && required) {
2384 throw new RuntimeException("Key [" + key + "] is required");
2385 }
2386 return defaultOption;
2387 }
2388 try {
2389 return (T) Enum.valueOf(enumType, val);
2390 } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
2391 throw new RuntimeException("Key [" + key + "] has invalid value [" + val + "] in [" + json.toString() + "]");
2392 }

◆ moveToMarket()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.moveToMarket ( PersonAPI  person,
MarketAPI  destination,
boolean  alwaysAddToCommDirectory 
)
static

Definition at line 5867 of file Misc.java.

5867 {
5868 ContactIntel intel = ContactIntel.getContactIntel(person);
5869 if (intel != null) {
5870 intel.relocateToMarket(destination, false);
5871 } else {
5872 boolean addToComms = alwaysAddToCommDirectory;
5873 boolean hidden = false;
5874 if (person.getMarket() != null) {
5875 MarketAPI market = person.getMarket();
5876 CommDirectoryEntryAPI entry = market.getCommDirectory().getEntryForPerson(person);
5877 if (entry != null) {
5878 addToComms = true;
5879 hidden = entry.isHidden();
5880 }
5881 market.removePerson(person);
5882 market.getCommDirectory().removePerson(person);
5883 }
5884
5885 if (!destination.getPeopleCopy().contains(person)) {
5886 destination.addPerson(person);
5887 }
5888 person.setMarket(destination);
5889
5890 if (addToComms) {
5891 if (destination.getCommDirectory() != null &&
5892 destination.getCommDirectory().getEntryForPerson(person) == null) {
5893 destination.getCommDirectory().addPerson(person);
5894 if (hidden) {
5895 CommDirectoryEntryAPI entry = destination.getCommDirectory().getEntryForPerson(person);
5896 if (entry != null) {
5897 entry.setHidden(true);
5898 }
5899 }
5900 }
5901 }
5902 }
5903 }

◆ normalizeNoise()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.normalizeNoise ( float  noise[][])
static

Definition at line 2448 of file Misc.java.

2448 {
2449 float minNoise = 1;
2450 float maxNoise = 0;
2451 for (int i = 0; i < noise.length; i++) {
2452 for (int j = 0; j < noise[0].length; j++) {
2453 if (noise[i][j] != -1) {
2454 if (noise[i][j] > maxNoise)
2455 maxNoise = noise[i][j];
2456 if (noise[i][j] < minNoise)
2457 minNoise = noise[i][j];
2458 }
2459 }
2460 }
2461
2462 if (minNoise >= maxNoise) return;
2463
2464 float range = maxNoise - minNoise;
2465
2466 for (int i = 0; i < noise.length; i++) {
2467 for (int j = 0; j < noise[0].length; j++) {
2468 if (noise[i][j] != -1) {
2469 float newNoise = (noise[i][j] - minNoise) / range;
2470 noise[i][j] = newNoise;
2471 } else {
2472 if (i > 0)
2473 noise[i][j] = noise[i - 1][j];
2474 else if (i < noise.length - 1)
2475 noise[i][j] = noise[i + 1][j];
2476 else
2477 noise[i][j] = .5f;
2478 }
2479 }
2480 }
2481 }

2108 {

2111 if (player == null || !player.isInHyperspace()) {
2112 return getPointWithinRadius(from, r);
2113 }

2117 }

2120 v.scale(minDist + 2000 - dist);
2121 Vector2f.add(v, from, v);
2122 return getPointWithinRadius(v, r);
2123 }

◆ playSound()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.playSound ( ApplyDamageResultAPI  result,
Vector2f  loc,
Vector2f  vel,
String  lightShields,
String  solidShields,
String  heavyShields,
String  lightHull,
String  solidHull,
String  heavyHull 
)
static

Definition at line 5701 of file Misc.java.

5704 {
5705 float shieldDam = result.getDamageToShields();
5706 float armorDam = result.getTotalDamageToArmor();
5707 float hullDam = result.getDamageToHull();
5708 float fluxDam = result.getEmpDamage();
5709
5710
5711 float totalDam = shieldDam + armorDam + hullDam;
5712 // if no damage, don't play sounds
5713 if (totalDam + fluxDam <= 0) return;
5714
5715 float vol = 1f;
5716
5717 float volMult = IMPACT_VOLUME_MULT;
5718
5719 // if shields were damaged, then ONLY shields were damaged
5720 if (shieldDam > 0) {
5721 String soundId = null;
5722 if (shieldDam < 70) {
5723 vol = shieldDam / 20f;
5724 if (vol > 1) vol = 1;
5725 soundId = lightShields;
5726 } else if (shieldDam < 200) {
5727 soundId = solidShields;
5728 } else {
5729 soundId = heavyShields;
5730 }
5731 if (soundId != null) {
5732 Global.getSoundPlayer().playSound(soundId, 1f, vol * volMult, loc, vel);
5733 }
5734 return;
5735 }
5736
5737 String soundId = null;
5738
5739 float physicalDam = armorDam + hullDam + fluxDam;
5740 //System.out.println(physicalDam);
5741 if (physicalDam < 5) {
5742 vol = physicalDam / 5f;
5743 if (vol > 1) vol = 1;
5744 soundId = lightHull;
5745 } else if (physicalDam < 40) {
5746 soundId = lightHull;
5747 } else if (physicalDam < 150) {
5748 soundId = solidHull;
5749 } else {
5750 soundId = heavyHull;
5751 }
5752
5753 if (soundId != null) {
5754 Global.getSoundPlayer().playSound(soundId, 1f, vol * volMult, loc, vel);
5755 }
5756 return;
5757 }
com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.IMPACT_VOLUME_MULT

Definition: Misc.java:5699

◆ replaceTokensFromMemory()

static String com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.replaceTokensFromMemory ( String  text,
Map< String, MemoryAPI >  memoryMap 
)
static

Definition at line 556 of file Misc.java.

556 {
557 List<String> keySet = new ArrayList<String>(memoryMap.keySet());
558 if (keySet.contains(MemKeys.LOCAL)) {
559 keySet.remove(MemKeys.LOCAL);
560 keySet.add(0, MemKeys.LOCAL);
561 }
562 for (String key : keySet) {
563 MemoryAPI memory = memoryMap.get(key);
564 List<String> keys = new ArrayList<String>(memory.getKeys());
565 Collections.sort(keys, new Comparator<String>() {
566 public int compare(String o1, String o2) {
567 return o2.length() - o1.length();
568 }
569 });
570 for (String token : keys) {
571 Object value = memory.get(token);
572 if (value == null) value = "null";
573 if (value instanceof String || value instanceof Boolean || value instanceof Float || value instanceof Integer) {
574 text = text.replaceAll("(?s)\\$" + Pattern.quote(key) + "\\." + Pattern.quote(token.substring(1)), value.toString());
575 text = text.replaceAll("(?s)\\$" + Pattern.quote(token.substring(1)), value.toString());
576 }
577 }
578 }
579 return text;
580 }

◆ rotateAroundOrigin() [1/2]

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.rotateAroundOrigin ( Vector2f  v,
float  angle 
)
static

Definition at line 1183 of file Misc.java.

1183 {
1184 float cos = (float) Math.cos(angle * RAD_PER_DEG);
1185 float sin = (float) Math.sin(angle * RAD_PER_DEG);
1186 Vector2f r = new Vector2f();
1187 r.x = v.x * cos - v.y * sin;
1188 r.y = v.x * sin + v.y * cos;
1189 return r;
1190 }

◆ rotateAroundOrigin() [2/2]

static Vector2f com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.rotateAroundOrigin ( Vector2f  v,
float  angle,
Vector2f  origin 
)
static

Definition at line 1192 of file Misc.java.

1192 {
1193 float cos = (float) Math.cos(angle * RAD_PER_DEG);
1194 float sin = (float) Math.sin(angle * RAD_PER_DEG);
1195 Vector2f r = Vector2f.sub(v, origin, new Vector2f());
1196 Vector2f r2 = new Vector2f();
1197 r2.x = r.x * cos - r.y * sin;
1198 r2.y = r.x * sin + r.y * cos;
1199 Vector2f.add(r2, origin, r2);
1200 return r2;
1201 }

◆ scaleColorSaturate()

static Color com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.scaleColorSaturate ( Color  color,
float  factor 
)
static

Definition at line 4909 of file Misc.java.

4909 {
4910 int red = (int) (color.getRed() * factor);
4911 int green = (int) (color.getGreen() * factor);
4912 int blue = (int) (color.getBlue() * factor);
4913 int alpha = (int) (color.getAlpha() * factor);
4914
4915 if (red > 255) red = 255;
4916 if (green > 255) green = 255;
4917 if (blue > 255) blue = 255;
4918 if (alpha > 255) alpha = 255;
4919
4920 return new Color(red, green, blue, alpha);
4921 }

◆ seedUniquifier()

static long com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.seedUniquifier ( )
static

Definition at line 3248 of file Misc.java.

3248 {
3249 // L'Ecuyer, "Tables of Linear Congruential Generators of
3250 // Different Sizes and Good Lattice Structure", 1999
3251 for (;;) {
3252 long current = seedUniquifier.get();
3253 long next = current * 181783497276652981L;
3254 //long next = current * 1181783497276652981L; // actual correct number?
3255 if (seedUniquifier.compareAndSet(current, next)) {
3256 return next;
3257 }
3258 }
3259 }

◆ setFlagWithReason()

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.setFlagWithReason ( MemoryAPI  memory,
String  flagKey,
String  reason,
boolean  value,
float  expire 
)
static

A flag can be set to true for several "reasons". As long as it hasn't been set back to false for all of the "reasons", it will remain set to true.

For example, a fleet may be hostile because it's responding to comm relay interference, and because the player is running with the transponder off. Until both are resolved, the "hostile" flag will remain set to true.

Note: a flag can not be "set" to false. If it's set to false for all the current reasons, the key is removed from memory.

Returns whether the flag is still set after this method does its work.

Parameters
memory
flagKey
reason
value
Returns

Definition at line 1408 of file Misc.java.

1408 {
1409 String requiredKey = flagKey + "_" + reason;
1410
1411 if (value) {
1412 memory.set(flagKey, true);
1413 memory.set(requiredKey, value, expire);
1414 memory.addRequired(flagKey, requiredKey);
1415 } else {
1416 memory.unset(requiredKey);
1417 }
1418
1419 return memory.contains(flagKey);
1420 }

2816 if (text != null) {
2817 text.setFontSmallInsignia();
2818 text.addParagraph(string, planet.getSpec().getIconColor());
2819 text.setFontInsignia();
2820 } else {

2824 Misc.getBasePlayerColor());//, new String[] {"" + points}, Misc.getHighlightColor());

)

◆ shouldNotWantRunFromPlayerEvenIfWeaker()

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.shouldNotWantRunFromPlayerEvenIfWeaker ( CampaignFleetAPI  fleet)
static

Mainly for avoiding stuff like "pirate fleet with 4 rustbuckets will run away from the player's 4 regular-quality frigates". Fleets that this evaluates to true for will avoid the player slowly.

Parameters
fleet
Returns

5961 {

5963 if (recentlyBeaten) return true;
5964 if (fleet.getFleetData() == null) return false;
5965
5966 float count = 0;
5967 for (FleetMemberAPI member : fleet.getFleetData().getMembersListCopy()) {
5968 if (!member.isCivilian() && member.getHullSpec() != null) {
5969 switch (member.getHullSpec().getHullSize()) {
5970 case CAPITAL_SHIP: count += 4; break;
5971 case CRUISER: count += 3; break;
5972 case DESTROYER: count += 2; break;
5973 case FRIGATE: count += 1; break;
5974 }
5975 }
5976 }

5989 }

5992 return true;
5993 }

◆ tokenize()

static List< Token > com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.tokenize ( String  string)
static

Definition at line 409 of file Misc.java.

409 {
410 List<Token> result = new ArrayList<Token>();
411 boolean inQuote = false;
412 boolean inOperator = false;
413
414 StringBuffer currToken = new StringBuffer();
415 for (int i = 0; i < string.length(); i++) {
416 char curr = string.charAt(i);
417 char next = 0;
418 if (i + 1 < string.length()) next = string.charAt(i + 1);
419 boolean charEscaped = false;
420 if (curr == '\\') {
421 i++;
422 if (i >= string.length()) {
423 throw new RuleException("Escape character at end of string in: [" + string + "]");
424 }
425 curr = string.charAt(i);
426 if (i + 1 < string.length()) next = string.charAt(i + 1);
427 charEscaped = true;
428 }
429// if (charEscaped) {
430// System.out.println("dfsdfs");
431// }
432
433 if (curr == '"' && !charEscaped) {
434 inQuote = !inQuote;
435 if (!inQuote && currToken.length() <= 0) {
436 result.add(new Token("", TokenType.LITERAL));
437 } else if (currToken.length() > 0) {
438 String str = currToken.toString();
439 if (!inQuote) {
440 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.LITERAL));
441 } else {
442 if (str.startsWith("$")) {
443 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.VARIABLE));
444 } else if (inOperator) {
445 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.OPERATOR));
446 } else {
447 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.LITERAL));
448 }
449 }
450 }
451 inOperator = false;
452 currToken.delete(0, 1000000);
453 continue;
454 }
455
456 if (!inQuote && (curr == ' ' || curr == '\t')) {
457 if (currToken.length() > 0) {
458 String str = currToken.toString();
459 if (str.startsWith("$")) {
460 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.VARIABLE));
461 } else if (inOperator) {
462 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.OPERATOR));
463 } else {
464 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.LITERAL));
465 }
466 }
467 inOperator = false;
468 currToken.delete(0, 1000000);
469 continue;
470 }
471
472 if (!inQuote && !inOperator && isOperatorChar(curr) && (curr != '-' || !isDigit(next))) {
473 if (currToken.length() > 0) {
474 String str = currToken.toString();
475 if (str.startsWith("$")) {
476 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.VARIABLE));
477 } else {
478 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.LITERAL));
479 }
480 }
481 currToken.delete(0, 1000000);
482 inOperator = true;
483 if (charEscaped && curr == 'n') {
484 currToken.append("\n");
485 } else {
486 currToken.append(curr);
487 }
488 continue;
489 }
490
491 if (!inQuote && inOperator && !isOperatorChar(curr)) {
492 if (currToken.length() > 0) {
493 String str = currToken.toString();
494 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.OPERATOR));
495 }
496 currToken.delete(0, 1000000);
497 inOperator = false;
498 if (charEscaped && curr == 'n') {
499 currToken.append("\n");
500 } else {
501 currToken.append(curr);
502 }
503 continue;
504 }
505
506 if (charEscaped && curr == 'n') {
507 currToken.append("\n");
508 } else {
509 currToken.append(curr);
510 }
511 }
512
513 if (inQuote) {
514 throw new RuleException("Unmatched quotes in string: " + string + "]");
515 }
516
517 if (currToken.length() > 0) {
518 String str = currToken.toString();
519 if (str.startsWith("$")) {
520 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.VARIABLE));
521 } else if (inOperator) {
522 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.OPERATOR));
523 } else {
524 result.add(new Token(str, TokenType.LITERAL));
525 }
526 }
527
528 return result;
529 }

◆ turnTowardsFacingV2()

static boolean com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.turnTowardsFacingV2 ( MissileAPI  missile,
float  desiredFacing,
float  relativeAngVel 
)
static

Definition at line 6213 of file Misc.java.

6213 {
6214
6215 float turnVel = missile.getAngularVelocity() - relativeAngVel;
6216 float absTurnVel = Math.abs(turnVel);
6217
6218 float turnDecel = missile.getEngineController().getTurnDeceleration();
6219 // v t - 0.5 a t t = dist
6220 // dv = a t; t = v / a
6221 float decelTime = absTurnVel / turnDecel;
6222 float decelDistance = absTurnVel * decelTime - 0.5f * turnDecel * decelTime * decelTime;
6223
6224 float facingAfterNaturalDecel = missile.getFacing() + Math.signum(turnVel) * decelDistance;
6225 float diffWithEventualFacing = getAngleDiff(facingAfterNaturalDecel, desiredFacing);
6226 float diffWithCurrFacing = getAngleDiff(missile.getFacing(), desiredFacing);
6227
6228 if (diffWithEventualFacing > 1f) {
6229 float turnDir = getClosestTurnDirection(missile.getFacing(), desiredFacing);
6230 if (Math.signum(turnVel) == Math.signum(turnDir)) {
6231 if (decelDistance > diffWithCurrFacing) {
6232 turnDir = -turnDir;
6233 }
6234 }
6235 if (turnDir < 0) {
6236 missile.giveCommand(ShipCommand.TURN_RIGHT);
6237 } else if (turnDir >= 0) {
6238 missile.giveCommand(ShipCommand.TURN_LEFT);
6239 } else {
6240 return false;
6241 }
6242 }
6243 return false;
6244 }

static float getAngleDiff(float from, float to)
Definition: Misc.java:1642

◆ wiggle()

static void com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Misc.wiggle ( Vector2f  v,
float  max 
)
static

Definition at line 2146 of file Misc.java.

2146 {
2147 v.x += (max * 2f * ((float) Math.random() - 0.5f));
2148 v.y += (max * 2f * ((float) Math.random() - 0.5f));
2149 if (v.length() == 0 || v.lengthSquared() == 0) {
2150 v.x += max * 0.25f;
2151 }
2152 }
